title: Unpredictability as Freedom

dialogue.speaker: Evan
dialogue.text: I'm free, in the sense that I cannot predict reliably my actions. Also, if you think I'm confined by my feelings, they can change too.
dialogue.context: Redefining freedom as unpredictability rather than control

scene_context: Evan offers a different conception of freedom - not as control or choice, but as the fundamental unpredictability of human behavior and emotion.
philosophical_theme: Freedom redefined as unpredictability and mutability rather than autonomous choice
visual_elements: Patterns that shift before they can be mapped, emotions as weather systems
